entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
